title: Amazon KDP Niche Research for Beginners to Find Profitable Book Ideas #selfpublishing #booktok
description:
If you’ve ever wondered how some self-published authors seem to find book ideas that actually sell, it all comes down to one thing — niche research.

In this video, I’ll walk you through how to do Amazon KDP niche research for beginners so you can find profitable book ideas that have real search demand but aren’t buried in competition. You’ll learn how I use Publisher Rocket to uncover hidden book niches, validate search volume, and choose topics that can consistently make sales.

As a corporate award-winning SEO expert and self-published author who’s made over $100K in book sales, I’m sharing the exact strategy I use to treat self-publishing like a business — and it starts with picking the right niche.

If you’re serious about building passive income through Amazon KDP, this is one of the most valuable skills you can master.

🧠 What You’ll Learn:
Why niche research determines your book’s success
How to find high-demand, low-competition book ideas
The exact keyword metrics I look for i
